author: Simon Difford
description: Boozy and stirred down. Cognac fortifies and combines harmoniously with Jägermeister's bittersweet herbal and spicy notes. Rich lavender enhances and amplifies these flavours with ginger bitters adding extra zingy spice and toning the blend. Best appreciated as an after-dinner digestif.
name: The Stag

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients and strain into chilled glass
